numbered_ace_sentences: 1. People who are 15-24 years old tend to believe that the world is a better place with each generation.
2. Indonesia has the highest percentage of people in the graph.
3. Mali has the lowest percentage of people in the graph.
4. Japan has the highest difference between the percentage of adults who are 40+ years old and the percentage of people who are 15-24 years old.
5. I wonder what common thread exists between the countries in the graph and the way that the graph presents the countries.
6. I wonder if the government of a country affects the results in the graph.
7. I wonder if the location of a country affects the results in the graph.
8. I wonder what other factors affect the results in the graph.
9. I am curious about what the results of the graph would be 100 years ago.
11. This topic is key to understanding how the people around me view the world.
12. The headline is: The generations of countries have different outlooks on the world.
